Title: Investigation - After a surprise attack
Designer: General Department of the Chinese People's Liberation Army (中国人民解放军总参谋部)
Publisher: General Department of the Chinese People's Liberation Army (中国人民解放军总参谋部)
Notes: On the left a Mao quotation: "I endorse such a slogan that stresses fearing neither hardship nor death."Nr. 22 of the set 'Posters showing measures against atomic, chemical and bacterial warfare' (1971).
